notes.text:
This update for jasper fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-9154: Fixed a potential denial of service in jpc_dec_process_sot() (bsc#1092115).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: There is a reachable abort in the function jpc_dec_process_sot in libjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c of JasPer 2.0.14 that will lead to a remote denial of service attack by triggering an unexpected jas_alloc2 return value, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-13745.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
